name: netbird
description: NetBird is a self-hosted WireGuard-based mesh VPN solution that simplifies secure networking across devices. It features identity-based access controls and a web UI for managing peers and networks.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Fast, secure mesh networking using modern WireGuard protocol for peer-to-peer connections

features.title: Zero
features.description: Automatic peer discovery and connection without manual WireGuard configuration

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Integrate with SSO providers like Okta, Auth0, or Google for user authentication

features.title: Network Policies
features.description: Define access rules and segmentation to control which peers can communicate

features.title: Cross
features.description: Native apps for Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android devices

features.title: Nat Traversal
features.description: Connect devices behind firewalls and NAT without port forwarding or public IPs

features.title: Web Management Ui
features.description: Configure networks, manage peers, and view connection status from a browser

features.title: Activity Monitoring
features.description: Track peer connections, data transfer, and network events in real-time
